PortMetrics.description: The PortMetrics schema contains usage and health statistics for a switch device or component port summary.
PortMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall represent the port metrics for a switch device or component port summary in a Redfish implementation.

title: #PortMetrics.PortMetrics
